title: Fresh Sugar Advanced Therapy Lip Treatment Translucent 0.15 oz
description: Sugar Lip Treatment Advanced Therapy is an anti-aging lip treatment proven to repair the lips, significantly boost moisture, enhance volume, and improve the definition of the lip area. It is fortified with a high concentration of ultra-nourishing, age-delay ingredients.Key ingredients:- Sea fennel helps to smooth fine lines and wrinkles and define the lip area.- Orange extract is rich with antioxidants that help protect the lips.- An ultra-nourishing complex of cupuacu butter, plum seed oil, and passionflower seed oil helps to hydrate, repair, and restore suppleness.- Hyaluronic Filling Spheres help to plump the lips to enhance volume.How to use:Apply throughout the day and before bedtime. Can be worn alone or as an age-delay base. For ideal results and SPF protection, follow with Sugar Lip Treatment SPF 15.Claims:- Sugar Lip Treatment Advanced Therapy is proven to have a significant moisturizing effect 6 hours after initial application.- Sugar Lip Treatment Advanced Therapy is proven to immediately smooth the lips and significantly moisturize, enhance volume, and repair the lips after just four weeks of use.After an independent consumer testing panel used Sugar Lip Treatment Advanced Therapy:- 100% noticed their lips were more moisturized, nourished, and supple- 100% reported healthier-looking, softer, silkier lips- 100% felt it protected their lips overnight, removed dry flakes, and repaired the lips- 97% reported improved elasticity and smoothness around the lip area- 93% felt it retexturized and visibly improved the overall appearance of their lips

title: Sigma Essential Kit - Mrs. Bunny
description:
The Sigma Beauty Mrs. Bunny Essential Kit was specially designed to deliver a perfect makeup application. This kit contains twelve brushes from our best-selling Essential Kit that utilize the Sigmax HD filament. The brushes come in an innovative and functional container that turns into two brush holders to keep you stylish, organized and vegan-friendly!



Brushes Included:

•E05 - Eye Liner: Create smooth and even lines. Use with gel or liquid liners.
•E30 - Pencil: Soften and smoke out lines. Soften pencil liners along the top and bottom lash lines, add shadow to line the eyes, or use to highlight inner corner of eyes.
•E40 - Tapered Blending: Soft blended crease. Using just the tips to apply color, sweep back and forth through the crease for a diffused and blended finish.
•E55 - Eye Shading: Even application of color. Place color across the whole lid for an even and strong application of product.
•E60 - Large Shader: Uniformly cover the whole lid with product. Apply cream shadow base or cream shadow for quick and even coverage.
•E65 - Small Angle: Create precise lining. Moves fluidly and easily across the upper and lower lash lines. Use with gel, cream or powder liners.
•E70 - Medium Angled Shading: Soft application of color. Use for brow highlighting or to blend the crease.
•F30 - Large Powder: Even powder application. Uniform blending of powder products onto the face and body.
•F40 - Large Angled Contour: Subtle cheek application. Use the angle to softly contour the cheekbone. Can also be used to apply blush.
•F50 - Duo Fibre: Creates an airbrush effect onto the skin. Can be used with powder, liquid or cream products.
•F60 - Foundation: Smooth foundation application. Apply liquid or cream products such as foundation and primer.
•F70 - Concealer: Conceal small areas. Conceal the hardest to reach areas such as around the nose and eyes.

 2013 Sigma Enterprises, LLC

title: Murad Acne Clarifying Cleanser, Step 1 Cleanse/Tone, 6.75 fl oz (200 ml)
description: Clears and prevents blemishes and skin breakouts. Effectively Treats and Prevents Acne and Skin Breakouts By: Reducing 99.9% of irritating surface bacteria in less than one minute. Penetrating deep to keep skin clean and clear. 1.5% Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment. Maximum strength gel cleanser combats acne and skin breakouts. 90% Proven effective when using in combination with Acne Complex products. (Clinically proven in over 90% of users to reduce blemishes in just 4 weeks). Salicylic Acid clears skin and prevents future breakouts. Green Tea Extract and Menthol calm and cool irritated skin. Dermatologist developed and tested. Murad does not test on animals. Made in the USA.

title: Murad Acne Exfoliating Acne Treatment Gel, 2: Treat/Repair, 3.4 fl oz (100 ml)
description: Eliminates acne and skin breakouts by reducing pore clogging bacteria and restoring skin health and clarity. 1.0% Salicylic acid acne treatment. Clears and prevents blemishes and skin breakouts. Powerful treatment gel control and prevents acne and skin breakouts. Proven 90% effective when used in combination with Acne Complex products (Clinically proven in over 90% users to reduce blemishes in just 4 weeks). Retinol and Glycolic Acid exfoliate to control breakouts. Patented delivery system allows for maximum treatment penetration. As a leader in research and development, Murad has long been at the forefront of skincare science. Applying insights from my skin research center, dermatology practice and the Murad Medical Spa, we continue this tradition. Ours is an inclusive health philosophy, based on the water principle, a comprehensive inside and out approach to optimal skin health and total wellness. Healthy skin is beautiful skin. My commitment is to provide you with the most advanced formulations and pharmaceutical grade ingredients to restore and strengthen your skin, allowing your healthy radiance to shine through. Scientifically proven. Dermatologist developed and tested. Murad does not test on animals. Made in the USA.

title: Konad Nail Art Stamping Polish - White
Bio Ionic OnePass 1.5" Nano Ceramic Straightening Iron
description: Bio Ionic Nano-Ceramic Conditioning Irons are faster, more effective and condition hair without flattening the cuticle.They feature Nano-Ionic Hybrid Mineral Technology, variable temperature settings for different hair types and leave the hair smooth, shiny, healthy and hydrated. The Fastest Straightening Iron Ever! The OnePass Iron represents a true break-through in straightening iron technology. The OnePass allows users to straighten hair in half the time compared to traditional irons. This is the professional?s #1 choice in irons!

title: Proactiv Solution Green Tea Moisturizer 1 oz
description: This feather-light moisturizing serum absorbs instantly, delivering deep hydration to dry, tired skin. It's formulated with concentrated botanical extracts and powerful antioxidants for a moisturizing experiance that's as healthl/y as it is refreshing. Best of all, the mineral-rich formula was created specifcally for the acne-prone complexion, so it won't clog pores or leave skin feeling greasy. Wear alone or with makeup, simply apply after Repairing Lotion.

description: Cream based eye primer. Available in three tones. Intensifes any shade of eye shadow and helps colors last longer. White helps color appear up to 100x more vivid. Pearl helps maximize any iridescent effect. Skin tone helps color hold naturally.

title: Bio Ionic Onepass Nano Ceramic Straightening Iron, Black 1"
description: OnePass is the fastest straightening iron ever! With patented silicone speed strips in the plates, it allows users to straighten and style hair in half the time. BioCeramic heaters heat up OnePass to 400 Degrees Fahrenheit with instant recovery for smooth results, roots to ends. OnePass Iron plates emit natural negative ions and far infrared energy that break down water clusters on the hair surface into smaller molecules that penetrate deeper, hydrating hair, removing frizzies, and creating healthy-looking, shiny hair.

title: John Frieda Frizz Ease 3-Day Straight Styling Spray, 3.5 Fluid Ounce
description: Frizz ease 3-day straight semi-permanent styling spray 3.5 fluid ounce creates visibly straighter hair for up to 3 days.

title: Sigma Eye Shadow Palette - Dare
description:
The Sigma Beauty DareTM Eye Shadow Palette includes eight eye shadow shades represented by warm, vibrant and neutral tones. The hues range from light corals to rich reds, complemented by yellow-gold tones. This palette allows you to create a wide range of bold and colorful looks! Contains matte and satin formulations.

Includes a dual-ended brush:
E20 - Short Shader: Apply color onto small areas of the eye such as the outer eyelid. Also use to smudge the lower lash line.
E45 - Small Tapered Blending: Picking up color with just the tip of the brush, apply intense colors to the crease to add depth and dimension to the eye.

 2013 Sigma Enterprises, LLC

title: Too Faced Prime and Poreless Pure Oil-Free Skin Smoothing Face Primer For Sensitive Skin, 1 Fluid Ounce
description: A 100% oil-free primer with the same amazing priming and perfecting benefits of our best-selling primed and pore less but with specific ingredients perfectly suited for sensitive or oily skin. Our colorless, oil-free formula mattifies surface oil and minimizes redness from irritated skin while it erases the appearance of pores, fine lines, and other imperfections. As always with our primers, foundations and powders stay in place all day, colors stay true, and skin has a smooth and pore less finish.

title: Skin Cleansing System Facial Brush & Body Care Kit for Women & Men. Includes 4 different heads - Large Body Brush, Soft Face Brush, Regular Face Brush and Pumice Stone. Water-Resistant.
description: Now you can enjoy the rejuvenating spa and dermatologist experiences at home- at a fraction of the cost. This Professional Skin Care System by ToiletTree Products is and advanced daily cleansing tool that helps polish away dull skin and gently exfoliates away impurities that traditional cleansing leaves behind. The result? Wonderfully cleaner, softer, radiant looking skin.The professional Skin Care System, along with a daily cleaning regimen, helps assist the following:-Stimulates skin renewal-Improves overall skin clarity and appearance.-Removes dead skin cells to expose healthier-looking skin-Energizes skin and leaves it sooth, soft and radiant.-Cleans deep to help remove stubborn makeup.-Enhances absorption of moisturizes.System includes: 2 face exfoliater (1 soft for sensitive skin types & 1 medium for normal skin types), 1 body exfoliater and 1 pumice sphere.Refills are also available.
